pages.text: Combat Gear is like a Spell Book with a couple changes.$(br2)-Canâ€™t use spells until IRON tier.$(br2)-Spells now have cooldowns based on spell complexity.

For all tiers after STONE tier:$(br2)You gain 1 spell slot every tier (2 start, 4 in total)$(br2)You gain 1 crafting slot every tier (6 start, 10 total)$(br2)Augment stacking increases by 1 every tier (1 start, 3 total)
To use like a spell book for crafting:$(br2) Sneak then click the GEAR cycle key ( $(k:ars_nouveau.open_book) ).

How to use:$(br2)Sword: $(br)Spell activation is right-click$(br2)right-click again to cast the spell on a mob or block, or to disable if not looking at anything.$(br2)You may also cast the spell with left-click (only works on mobs)
Bow:$(br)Spell activation is left-click while charging the bow.$(br2)Left-click again to disable$(br2)Shoot arrow to cast spell (arrows with spells do 0 base damage)
Mirror:$(br)Spell activation is automatic. All you do is right-click.$(br2)(you also need to be off cooldown and have mana)
